Html: I am unable to build CompositeApplicationLibrary.sln do the fact that the reference to Composite.TestSupport.dll in Composite.UnityExtensions.Desktop.Tests is missing.  The same is true for Composite.UnityExtensions.Silverlight.Tests which a missing reference to Composite.Silverlight.TestSupport.
I resolved the problem by adding the Composite.TestSupport and Composite.Silverlight.TestSupport projects to their respective CompositeApplicationLibrary solution folders.  The solution now builds.

Thanks for the catch.  We have fixed it by added the new TestSupport projects to the Sln and have uploaded a fix to the Source Code it's labeled 42969

Larry
